Running: inlinedScriptFormatting
====== 8< ------
<html><body><script>
function f() {
}
</script><script>
function g() {
    var a;
    window.return = 10;
    if (a)
        return;
}
</script></body></html>
------ >8 ======

Running: generatorFormatter
====== 8< ------
function *max() {
    var a = yield;
    var b = yield;
    if (a > b)
        return a;
    else
        return b;
}

------ >8 ======
Correct mapping for <max>
Correct mapping for <*>
Correct mapping for <else>
